alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Interior Hancock; Northern Washington; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 1:55PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow will affect northern Hancock...Washington and southern Penobscot Counties... At 151 PM EST...An area of moderate to heavy snow was located across portions of Downeast Maine and the Penobscot Valley. Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Bangor, Old Town, Ellsworth, Bucksport, Dexter, Newport, Calais, Howland, Danforth, Vanceboro, Orono, Brewer, Hampden, Hermon, Corinth, Veazie, Dedham, Kenduskeag and Perry. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 157 and 229. US Highway 1 near Orland, and between Princeton and Eaton. State Highway 11 between Newport and Bradford. State Highway 9 between Dixmont and Baring. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow, which could cause patchy blowing snow. * Visibilities will be less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. * Snowfall rates around 1 inch per hour are occurring in this area of heavy snow.
